title: 2 Bedroom unit at Phoenix! CALL FOR DETAILS!!
posting_body: ['Welcome Home to Crestone Apartments Offering 1, 2 and 3 Bedroom Renovated Apartments.', 'Crestone Apartments is conveniently located just minutes away from Downtown Brighton and beautiful Veterans Park.', 'Near Downtown Brighton.', 'Our beautiful studios, 1, 2, & 3 bedroom apartments are newly renovated with wood-style plank flooring, modern paint and finishes, new appliances, and LED lighting.', 'Come enjoy modern living with our open floorplans, picture windows, and fully equipped kitchens.', 'Crestone also has all the conveniences you need, including professional property management services, on-site laundry, picnic areas, and, coming in Spring of 2022, a brand-new children’s play area and dog park!', 'Come visit us today and enjoy our updated and friendly community!', 'Call Chasity at', 'show contact info', 'for a tour today with Crestone Apartments!', '<URL>', 'Video tour: https://youtu.be/XLQQOi823rc', 'Fees and Deposits:', 'Application Fee $40.00 (Per person 18 years of age and older)', 'Admin fee $108 non-refundable paid at move-in', 'Security Deposit $300.00 (required to hold apartment)', 'Pet Rent, Fees and Deposits:', '$30 monthly pet rent per pet', '$150 pet fee paid at move in', '$150 pet deposit paid at move in', '2 pet limit per apartment home', 'Qualifications:', 'Applicant’s gross income (before taxes) must equal 2.5 times monthly rent', 'Income verification (paystubs, bank statements, offer letters, etc.', 'last 30 days.)', 'Credit and criminal background checks will be completed', 'Evictions last 7 years will be declined', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 7', 'OR Text', '7', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact our leasing team.', 'Need more information?', 'Copy this link:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 750 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Kitchen', '- Air Conditioning', '- Refrigerator', '- High Speed Internet Access', '- Smoke Free', '- Oven', '- Heating', 'Community Amenities', '- Dogs and Cats Allowed', '- Laundry Facilities', 'Pet Policy', 'Dogs and Cats Allowed, per pet- $150 Fee $150 Deposit $30 Monthly rent per pet', 'Birds, Fish and Reptiles Allowed', 'Crestone Apartments', '55 N Kuner Rd , Brighton, CO, 80601', 'wi52ltXRemH']
